snippet: Refugees in northeast Nigeria described a days-long rampage of shooting, looting and arson by the Islamist terror group.
abstract: Refugees fleeing attacks by Islamist group Boko Haram in northeast Nigeria describe dozens of civilian deaths and scores of houses destroyed in fishing village of Baga, near Lake Chad, during week of rampaging, shooting, looting and arson.

byline.contributor: A correspondent for The New York Times contributed reporting from Maiduguri, Nigeria.

lead_paragraph: Refugees in northeast Nigeria described a days-long rampage of shooting, looting and arson by the Islamist terror group.

headline.main: Dozens Said to Die in Boko Haram Attack
headline.print_headline: Dozens Said to Have Died in Boko Haram Attack
